blocks.name: orvclteel
blocks.content: Preimage maps produced by the "less than or equal to" relation are measurable sets. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 4-Feb-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm orvclteel(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, corvc(cle), c1), cdm(c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cprb))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(crrv, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
} = {
  orrvccel(hs0, c0, cle, c1, c2, cr, w0)
  eqeltrd(crab(hs0, cr, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1)), cfv(ccld, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo))), co(cmnf, cioc, c1), w0)
  eqtr4d(crab(hs0, cr, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1)), co(cmnf, cioc, c1), crab(hs0, cxr, wa(wbr(cmnf, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1))), w0)
  rabbidva2(hs0, cr, cxr, w0, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1), wa(wbr(cmnf, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1)))
  impbida(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wa(wbr(cmnf, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1))))
  jca(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wa(wbr(cmnf, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1)))
  ad2antrl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr))
  rexr(cv(hs0))
  jca(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1))), wbr(cmnf, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1))
  ad2antrl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1), wbr(cmnf, clt, cv(hs0)))
  mnflt(cv(hs0))
  simprr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1))
  jca(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wa(wbr(cmnf, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1))
  syl22anc(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wa(wbr(cmnf, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(cmnf, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1))
  simprl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wa(wbr(cmnf, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1)))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wa(wbr(cmnf, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1))), wcel(c1, cr))
  simprrl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(cmnf, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1))
  xrre(cv(hs0), c1)
  simprrr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wbr(cmnf, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1))
  sylancr(w0, wceq(co(cmnf, cioc, c1), crab(hs0, cxr, wa(wbr(cmnf, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1)))), wcel(cmnf, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr))
  mnfxr()
  rexrd(c1, w0)
  iocval(hs0, cmnf, c1)
  syl(w0, wcel(co(cmnf, cioc, c1), cfv(ccld, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))), wcel(c1, cr))
  iocmnfcld(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cle)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(cmnf)
}

thm orvclteel(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[oRVC(≤)]c1)∈ dom(c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ Prob)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈(rRndVar ` c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ℝ)
} = {
  orrvccel(hs0, c0, cle, c1, c2, cr, w0)
  eqeltrd({ hs0 ∈ ℝ | hs0[≤]c1 }, (Clsd `(topGen ` ran((,)))), (-∞[(,]]c1), w0)
  eqtr4d({ hs0 ∈ ℝ | hs0[≤]c1 }, (-∞[(,]]c1), { hs0 ∈ ℝ* |(-∞[<]hs0 ∧ hs0[≤]c1)}, w0)
  rabbidva2(hs0, cr, cxr, w0, hs0[≤]c1, (-∞[<]hs0 ∧ hs0[≤]c1))
  impbida(w0, (hs0 ∈ ℝ ∧ hs0[≤]c1), (hs0 ∈ ℝ* ∧(-∞[<]hs0 ∧ hs0[≤]c1)))
  jca((w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ ℝ ∧ hs0[≤]c1)), hs0 ∈ ℝ*, (-∞[<]hs0 ∧ hs0[≤]c1))
  ad2antrl(w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ, hs0[≤]c1, hs0 ∈ ℝ*)
  rexr(hs0)
  jca((w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ ℝ ∧ hs0[≤]c1)), -∞[<]hs0, hs0[≤]c1)
  ad2antrl(w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ, hs0[≤]c1, -∞[<]hs0)
  mnflt(hs0)
  simprr(w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ, hs0[≤]c1)
  jca((w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ ℝ* ∧(-∞[<]hs0 ∧ hs0[≤]c1))), hs0 ∈ ℝ, hs0[≤]c1)
  syl22anc((w0 ∧(hs0 ∈ ℝ* ∧(-∞[<]hs0 ∧ hs0[≤]c1))), hs0 ∈ ℝ, hs0 ∈ ℝ*, c1 ∈ ℝ, -∞[<]hs0, hs0[≤]c1)
  simprl(w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ*, (-∞[<]hs0 ∧ hs0[≤]c1))
  adantr(w0, (hs0 ∈ ℝ* ∧(-∞[<]hs0 ∧ hs0[≤]c1)), c1 ∈ ℝ)
  simprrl(w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ*, -∞[<]hs0, hs0[≤]c1)
  xrre(hs0, c1)
  simprrr(w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ*, -∞[<]hs0, hs0[≤]c1)
  sylancr(w0, (-∞[(,]]c1)= { hs0 ∈ ℝ* |(-∞[<]hs0 ∧ hs0[≤]c1)}, -∞ ∈ ℝ*, c1 ∈ ℝ*)
  mnfxr()
  rexrd(c1, w0)
  iocval(hs0, cmnf, c1)
  syl(w0, (-∞[(,]]c1)∈(Clsd `(topGen ` ran((,)))), c1 ∈ ℝ)
  iocmnfcld(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cle)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(cmnf)
}

blocks.name: dstfrvel
blocks.content: Elementhood of preimage maps produced by the "less than or equal to" relation. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 13-Feb-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm dstfrvel(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, corvc(cle), c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cprb))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(crrv, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cuni(cdm(c3))))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(cfv(c1, c0), cle, c2))
} = {
  eleqtrrd(c0, co(c1, corvc(cle), c2), cima(ccnv(c1), crab(hs0, cr, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c2))), w0)
  mpbid(w0, wcel(c0, cima(ccnv(c1), crab(hs0, cr, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c2)))), wcel(cfv(c1, c0), crab(hs0, cr, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c2))))
  sylanbrc(w0, wcel(cfv(c1, c0), crab(hs0, cr, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c2))), wcel(cfv(c1, c0), cr), wbr(cfv(c1, c0), cle, c2))
  ffvelrnd(c1, c0, cr, cuni(cdm(c3)), w0)
  elrab(hs0, cfv(c1, c0), cr, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c2), wbr(cfv(c1, c0), cle, c2))
  breq1(cv(hs0), cfv(c1, c0), cle, c2)
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wcel(cfv(c1, c0), crab(hs0, cr, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c2))), wcel(c0, cima(ccnv(c1), crab(hs0, cr, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c2))))), wfun(c1), wcel(c0, cdm(c1)))
  ffund(c1, cuni(cdm(c3)), cr, w0)
  rrvvf(c1, c3, w0)
  eleqtrrd(c0, cdm(c1), cuni(cdm(c3)), w0)
  rrvdm(c1, c3, w0)
  fvimacnv(c1, c0, crab(hs0, cr, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c2)))
  orrvcval4(hs0, c1, cle, c2, c3, cr, w0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c1, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.w(wbr(cfv(c1, c0), cle, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cle)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dstfrvel(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈(c1[oRVC(≤)]c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ Prob)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈(rRndVar ` c3))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ ⋃ dom(c3))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c1 ` c0)[≤]c2)
} = {
  eleqtrrd(c0, (c1[oRVC(≤)]c2), (`' c1 " { hs0 ∈ ℝ | hs0[≤]c2 }), w0)
  mpbid(w0, c0 ∈(`' c1 " { hs0 ∈ ℝ | hs0[≤]c2 }), (c1 ` c0)∈ { hs0 ∈ ℝ | hs0[≤]c2 })
  sylanbrc(w0, (c1 ` c0)∈ { hs0 ∈ ℝ | hs0[≤]c2 }, (c1 ` c0)∈ ℝ, (c1 ` c0)[≤]c2)
  ffvelrnd(c1, c0, cr, ⋃ dom(c3), w0)
  elrab(hs0, (c1 ` c0), cr, hs0[≤]c2, (c1 ` c0)[≤]c2)
  breq1(hs0, (c1 ` c0), cle, c2)
  syl2anc(w0, ((c1 ` c0)∈ { hs0 ∈ ℝ | hs0[≤]c2 } ↔ c0 ∈(`' c1 " { hs0 ∈ ℝ | hs0[≤]c2 })), Fun(c1), c0 ∈ dom(c1))
  ffund(c1, ⋃ dom(c3), cr, w0)
  rrvvf(c1, c3, w0)
  eleqtrrd(c0, dom(c1), ⋃ dom(c3), w0)
  rrvdm(c1, c3, w0)
  fvimacnv(c1, c0, { hs0 ∈ ℝ | hs0[≤]c2 })
  orrvcval4(hs0, c1, cle, c2, c3, cr, w0)
  diff.hs0.c((c1 ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.w((c1 ` c0)[≤]c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cle)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

  diff.cn.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(nat1)
}
